petSelection.title: Select Your Pet
petSelection.description: Choose whether you are looking for insurance for a dog or a cat.

petDetails.description: Please provide some details about your pet.

validation.validAge: Please enter a valid age (1-25 years).

priceCustomization.title: Customize Your Plan
priceCustomization.description: Select a product variant and add-on coverages to tailor your pet's insurance.
priceCustomization.preexistingConditionsDescription: Covers conditions diagnosed before the policy start date.
priceCustomization.worldwideCoverageDescription: Extends your pet's coverage for international travel.
priceCustomization.deductibleInfo: A higher deductible typically results in a lower monthly premium.
priceCustomization.coPayCoverageInfo: A lower co-pay coverage percentage (higher co-pay) typically results in a lower monthly premium.

exampleCalculation.title: Example Calculation
exampleCalculation.description: Our data shows the average cost for an abscess is CHF {{vetCost}}.
exampleCalculation.scenario: If {{petName}} gets bitten by another animal and an abscess forms, the insurance pays:

contactDetails.title: Your Contact Details
contactDetails.description: Please provide your contact and address details to finalize your quote.

validation.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.validPhone: Please enter a valid phone number or leave it empty.

contactDetails.successToast: Contact and address details saved successfully!

confirmation.title: Quote Confirmed!
confirmation.description: Thank you for choosing us! Here's a summary of your pet's insurance plan.
